Description: Unique 20 character code identifying the specific estimate series.
6-digit occupation code as defined 2018 Standard Occupational Classification (SOC) system, see www.bls.gov/soc.
Main requirement type: physical demands, environmental conditions, education, training, and experience, as well as cognitive and mental requirements.
The unique code for the datatype and specific requirement.
Description of datatype and specific requirement.
The code indicating the group of related estimates.
Description of a group of related estimates.
The code indicating the group of related estimates that sum to together.
Description of related estimates that sum to together.
The code indicating the estimate measurement.
Standard error associated with the estimate.
Footnote code associated with the series id's data value. See footnote codes tab for more information.
Footnote code associated with the series id's standard error. See footnote codes tab for more information.
Footnote code associated with the series id. See footnote codes tab for more information.
